_xResult.title: Veronica Blouse
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made red silk top with side gathers
_xResult.longdesc:
Float like a butterfly and sting like a bee (when needed) in this custom made red top. It is soft as a feather, made of 100% silk and features side gathers that streamline the fit and make for a nice and stylish top.

 

This top is more than just made to your measurments. Customize your neckline, sleeves, color and even hem length. Options are below:

 

Necklines: U Neck, V Neck, Round Neck

 

Sleeves: Short Sleeves, 3/4 Sleeves, Full Sleeves

 

Length: Crop Length, Waist Length, Hip Length
